com.ssdd.ntp.bean

Class Pair

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ssdd.ntp.bean.Pair
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Pair
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a pair of (delay,offset) for NTP bussines logic.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Héctor Sánchez San Blas, Francisco Pinto Santos
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • toMarzulloTuple

        public MarzulloTuple[] toMarzulloTuple()
        transform the pair into a pair of marzullo tuples (ofset - delay/2, -1) and (ofset - delay/2, 1).
        Returns:
        a pair of Marzullo tuples representing the strat and end of the interval represented by the Pair

      • calculateOffset

        private double calculateOffset(long time0,
                               long time1,
                               long time2,
                               long time3)
        given four time stamples (two in the client side and two in the server side), calculates the offset between two hosts.
        Parameters:
        time0 - first time sampled in client
        time1 - first time sampled in server
        time2 - first time sampled in server
        time3 - second time sampled in client
        Returns:
        the calculated offset for the NTP algorithm.

      • calculateDelay

        private double calculateDelay(long time0,

        time0 - first time sampled in client
        time1 - first time sampled in server
        time2 - first time sampled in server
        time3 - second time sampled in client
        Returns:
